insertCustomer: insert into serialentrepreneur.users (name, email, password) values ($1, $2, $3)
insertCustomerRegistrations: insert into serialentrepreneur.user_registrations(comfirmation_code, name, email, password) values ($1, $2, $3, $4)
selectCustomerRegistrations: select * from serialentrepreneur.user_registrations where email = $1 and comfirmation_code = $2
deleteExpiredCustomerRegistrations: delete from serialentrepreneur.user_registrations where created_at < now() - interval '1 day'
updateCustomerPassword: update serialentrepreneur.users set password = $1 where email = $2
selectCustomerPasswordReset: select * from serialentrepreneur.user_password_reset where email = $1 and reset_code = $2
deleteExpiredCustomerPasswordReset: delete from serialentrepreneur.user_password_reset where created_at < now() - interval '1 day'
